alert.note: Alert for Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LIVE OAK COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Lucas, or 11 miles southeast of George West, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Lucas, Annarose, Dinero, and Lagarto. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 636 and 652. US Highway 59 between mile markers 728 and 736. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
